### Investigator Notes
- Query resolution rate at 94%
- All CRFs current through prior visit cycle
- DDI mechanism confirmed: LNS-4821 CYP3A4 inhibition leads to statin accumulation; protocol amendment drafted to exclude statin co-administration

### Events
- Site 01 new coordinator onboarding completed
- Data management plan revision v2.5 distributed

- Protocol amendment v4.0 drafted; sponsor medical review initiated

### Notes
- Week 25: DDI confirmed. Protocol amendment drafted to exclude statin co-administration.
